Name: Just get in through the door
About the game: It’s a puzzle game. Every level is a room with a door in it. Your goal is to get in through the door. The way in is not always clear so sometimes you’ll have to figure out a clue. I tried not to repeat myself, so every level you’ll find something new. Number of Levels: 30 Gameplay: Clicking buttons Running Moving cubes The Goal: Get in through the door It’s all easy.
